confirm.title: Confirm Delete
confirm.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the camera group {{name}}?

errorMessage.mustLeastCharacters: Camera group name must be at least 2 characters.
errorMessage.nameMustNotPeriod: Camera group name must not contain a period.

setting.label: Camera Streaming Settings
setting.title: {{cameraName}} Streaming Settings
setting.desc: Change the live streaming options for this camera group's dashboard. These settings are device/browser-specific.
setting.audioIsAvailable: Audio is available for this stream
setting.audioIsUnavailable: Audio is unavailable for this stream

tips.title: Audio must be output from your camera and configured in go2rtc for this stream.

noStreaming.label: No Streaming
noStreaming.desc: Camera images will only update once per minute and no live streaming will occur.

smartStreaming.label: Smart Streaming (recommended)
smartStreaming.desc: Smart streaming will update your camera image once per minute when no detectable activity is occurring to conserve bandwidth and resources. When activity is detected, the image seamlessly switches to a live stream.

desc.title: Camera image will always be a live stream when visible on the dashboard, even if no activity is being detected.
desc.warning: Continuous streaming may cause high bandwidth usage and performance issues. Use with caution.

compatibilityMode.label: Compatibility mode
compatibilityMode.desc: Enable this option only if your camera's live stream is displaying color artifacts and has a diagonal line on the right side of the image.
